text: Jurques () is a former commune in the Calvados department in the Normandy region in northwestern France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune Dialan sur Chaîne.Arrêté préfectoral 26 September 2016 ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Calvados department ==References== Category:Former communes of Calvados (department) Category:Calvados communes articles needing translation from French Wikipedia Category:Populated places disestablished in 2017
title: Jurques
